div.p: Spatiotemporal changes in the annual mean anthropogenic heat flux (AHF) based on the past and future global gridded AHF dataset. ( a) shows spatial distribution of AHF in 1970. ( bâ€“ d) are same as ( a) but for 2015, 2030, and 2050, respectively. ( e) shows the difference in AHF between 1970 and 2015 and ( f) shows the difference in AHF between 2015 and 2050.
